name: catwalk
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the long, narrow stage that models walk along in a fashion show
Patrik Giardino/ Corbis/GettyImages
a narrow path, raised above the ground, often built for workers to walk on outside a building that is being built or repaired

Add to word list
Add to word list
a narrow structure built beside a bridge or building or above a stage, used for walking or performing work
A catwalk is also a long, narrow stage used in a fashion show by models (= people employed to show how new clothes look when they are worn).
